data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Shumen, Bulgaria a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shumen, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Shumen unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Shumen, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Shumen, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turk people.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Shumen, Bulgaria to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Over 17.62 percent of the people of Shumen are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Shumen, Bulgaria has a population of 171,800.

We estimate Shumen has 3,404 people who might know Jesus, 138,117 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 30,279 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Shumen, Bulgaria to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.
